```{python}
#| label: fig-trx-superheterodyne
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "Block diagram of a super-heterodyne transceiver (TRX) showing the main functional blocks of RX and TX." 
import schemdraw as sd
import schemdraw.elements as elm
import schemdraw.dsp as dsp

sd.svgconfig.svg2 = False

with sd.Drawing(canvas='svg') as d:
    d.config(unit=2, fontsize=14)

    rf_pos=d.here

    dsp.Arrow().right(d.unit/2).label(r'$s_\mathrm{RX}$', 'left')
    dsp.Amp()
    dsp.Arrow().right(d.unit/4)
    dsp.Filter(response='bp').label(r'Image BPF', 'top', ofst=.25)
    dsp.Arrow().right(d.unit/4)
    rxmix = dsp.Mixer()
    dsp.Arrow().right(d.unit/4)
    dsp.Filter(response='bp').label(r'IF BPF', 'top', ofst=.25)
    dsp.Arrow().right(d.unit/4)
    dsp.Amp()
    dsp.Line().right(d.unit/4).dot()

    d.push()
    dsp.Arrow().down(d.unit/2).at(rxmix.S).reverse().label(r'$f_\mathrm{LO,RX}$')
    rxosc = dsp.Oscillator()
    dsp.Line().right(d.unit/4).at(rxosc.N)
    pll1 = dsp.Square().label('PLL')
    d.pop()

    # RX I path
    d.push()
    dsp.Line().up(d.unit)
    dsp.Arrow().right(d.unit/4)
    mix1 = dsp.Mixer()
    dsp.Arrow().length(d.unit/4)
    lpf1 = dsp.Filter(response='lp')
    dsp.Arrow().length(d.unit/4)
    dsp.Amp()
    dsp.Arrow().length(d.unit/2).linestyle('--')
    d.pop()

    # RX Q path
    d.push()
    dsp.Line().down(d.unit)
    dsp.Arrow().right(d.unit/4)
    mix2 = dsp.Mixer()
    dsp.Arrow().length(d.unit/4)
    lpf2 = dsp.Filter(response='lp')
    dsp.Arrow().length(d.unit/4)
    dsp.Amp()
    dsp.Arrow().length(d.unit/2).linestyle('--')
    d.pop()

    # PLL
    d.move(dx=d.unit/4)
    iq1 = dsp.Square().label('0/90°')
    dsp.Arrow().at(iq1.N).up(d.unit/2)
    dsp.Arrow().at(iq1.S).down(d.unit/2)
    dsp.Arrow().at(iq1.E).right(d.unit/4).reverse()
    osc1 = dsp.Oscillator()
    dsp.Line().right(d.unit/4)
    pll1 = dsp.Square().label('PLL')
    
    # Transmitter section (mirrored below)
    # Start from beginning of the diagram and move down
    d.here = rf_pos
    d.move(dx=0, dy=-d.unit*3.5)

    dsp.Arrow().right(d.unit/2).label(r'$s_\mathrm{TX}$', 'left').reverse()
    dsp.Amp().reverse()
    dsp.Arrow().right(d.unit/4).reverse()
    dsp.Filter(response='bp').label(r'Image BPF', 'top', ofst=.25)
    dsp.Arrow().right(d.unit/4).reverse()
    txmix = dsp.Mixer()
    dsp.Arrow().right(d.unit/4).reverse()
    dsp.Filter(response='bp').label(r'IF BPF', 'top', ofst=.25)
    dsp.Arrow().right(d.unit/4).reverse()
    dsp.Amp().reverse()
    dsp.Arrow().right(d.unit/4).dot().reverse()

    d.push()
    dsp.Arrow().down(d.unit/2).at(txmix.S).reverse().label(r'$f_\mathrm{LO,TX}$')
    txosc = dsp.Oscillator()
    dsp.Line().right(d.unit/4).at(txosc.N)
    pll1 = dsp.Square().label('PLL')
    d.pop()

    # TX I path
    d.push()
    dsp.Line().up(d.unit)
    dsp.Line().right(d.unit/4)
    mix3 = dsp.Mixer()
    dsp.Arrow().length(d.unit/4).reverse()
    lpf3 = dsp.Filter(response='lp')
    dsp.Arrow().length(d.unit/4).reverse()
    dsp.Amp().reverse()
    dsp.Arrow().length(d.unit/2).reverse().linestyle('--')
    d.pop()

   # TX Q path
    d.push()
    dsp.Line().down(d.unit)
    dsp.Line().right(d.unit/4)
    mix4 = dsp.Mixer()
    dsp.Arrow().length(d.unit/4).reverse()
    lpf4 = dsp.Filter(response='lp')
    dsp.Arrow().length(d.unit/4).reverse()
    dsp.Amp().reverse()
    dsp.Arrow().length(d.unit/2).reverse().linestyle('--')
    d.pop()

    # PLL
    d.move(dx=d.unit/4)
    iq2 = dsp.Square().label('0/90°')
    dsp.Arrow().at(iq2.N).up(d.unit/2)
    dsp.Arrow().at(iq2.S).down(d.unit/2)
    dsp.Arrow().at(iq2.E).right(d.unit/4).reverse()
    osc2 = dsp.Oscillator()
    dsp.Line().right(d.unit/4)
    pll2 = dsp.Square().label('PLL')

```
